title: Advocate -- Trustworthy Evidence in Cloud Systems
summary: The rapid evolution of cloud-native applications, characterized by dynamic, interconnected services, presents significant challenges for maintaining trustworthy and auditable systems, especially in sensitive contexts, such as finance or healthcare. Traditional methods of verification and certification are often inadequate due to the fast-past and dynamic development practices common in cloud computing.
